short.am,bg,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,et,f: Request a certificate for your device.
short.da: Anmod om et certifikat til din enhed.
short.de: Fordere ein Zertifikat für dein Gerät an.
short.es: Solicita un certificado para tu dispositivo.
short.es_419: Solicite un certificado para su dispositivo.
short.fil: Humiling ng certificate para sa device mo.
short.fr: Demander un certificat pour votre appareil
short.hi: अपने डिवाइस के लिए प्रमाणपत्र का अनुरोध करें.
short.it: Richiedi un certificato per il dispositivo.
short.ja: デバイスの証明書をリクエストします。
short.nl: Een certificaat aanvragen voor uw apparaat.
short.no: Be om et sertifikat for enheten din.
short.sv: Begär ett certifikat för din enhet.
short.th: ขอใบรับรองสำหรับอุปกรณ์ของคุณ
short.vi: Yêu cầu chứng chỉ cho thiết bị của bạn.

long.ar,cs,da,de,es,es_419,fi,fil,fr,he,hi,hu:
This extension facilitates users enrolling enterprise Chromebooks via ADCS with Microsoft Public Key Infrastructure (PKI).

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.

Additionally, this extension utilizes open source libraries from third parties that come with their own licenses. Please see below for each library and associated license:

long.am,bg,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,et,f:
Easily request a certificate for your managed Chromebook to access resources in a PKI environment.

This extension provides an out-of-the-box certificate enrollment experience for Chromebooks in enterprises with a deployment of Microsoft Public Key Infrastructure based off of Active Directory Certificate Services (ADCS).

Once installed on managed devices, this extension will allow users to generate hardware-backed keys and use them to request certificates from ADCS. You can find the deployment and usage manuals under our support pages. 

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.

Additionally, this extension utilizes open source libraries from third parties that come with their own licenses. Please see below for each library and associated license:
